title: Naruto: Shippuuden Movie 1 (Naruto: Shippuden the Movie)
synopsis: A group of ninja is planning to revive a powerful demon, and once its spirit is reunited with its body, the world will be destroyed. The only way to prevent this from happening is for Shion, a shrine maiden, to seal it away for good.
characters: ['Uzumaki, Naruto', 'Hatake, Kakashi', 'Lee, Rock', 'Haruno, Sakura', 'Hyuuga, Neji', 'Shion', 'Nara, Shikamaru', 'Might, Guy', 'Tsunade', 'Temari']
voices: ['Takeuchi, Junko', 'Inoue, Kazuhiko', 'Masukawa, Yoichi', 'Nakamura, Chie', 'Toochika, Kouichi', 'Fujimura, Ayumi', 'Morikubo, Shoutarou', 'Ebara, Masashi', 'Katsuki, Masako', 'Park, Romi']
staff: [['Nunokawa, Yuuji', ['Producer']], ['Kamegaki, Hajime', ['Director']], ['Ebina, Yasunori', ['Sound Director']], ['Kawasaki, Hirotsugu', ['Storyboard', ' Key Animation']]]
